aspartame.reason: Linked to migraines and neurological issues

sodium benzoate.reason: Potential allergen; can form benzene with vitamin C

sodium lauryl sulfate.reason: May cause skin irritation and dryness

zinc pyrithione.reason: Linked to skin sensitivity and environmental toxicity

ammonia.reason: Can irritate respiratory system and skin

sorbitol.reason: Excess may cause bloating or laxative effects

fiber.reason: Improves digestion and blood sugar control

protein.reason: Essential for muscle repair and growth

vitamin c.reason: Boosts immunity and reduces oxidative stress

xylitol.reason: Toxic to pets and may cause digestive issues

fructose.reason: Linked to insulin resistance and fatty liver

gluten.reason: Problematic for celiac and gluten-sensitive individuals

carrageenan.reason: Linked to inflammation and digestive issues
